All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractAiProvider
The abstract base class for all AI model providers, now with model caching.
AbstractContextProvider
The base class for all context providers, defining the contract for injecting just-in-time context into an AI request.
AbstractMessage
The abstract base class for all messages in a conversation, providing common metadata and functionality for the rich, hierarchical V2 domain model.
AbstractMessagePanel<T extends AbstractMessage>
A base class for rendering AbstractMessage instances in a collapsible, diff-based UI component.
AbstractModel
The abstract base class for a specific AI model (e.g., "gemini-1.5-pro-latest").
AbstractModelMessage<R extends Response,T extends AbstractToolMessage>
Represents a message originating from the AI model.
AbstractPart
The abstract base class for all components of a AbstractMessage.
AbstractPartPanel<T extends AbstractPart>
The abstract base class for rendering AbstractPart instances in a diff-based UI component.
AbstractPathResource<R,C>
An abstract base class for all resources that represent a file on the local filesystem.
AbstractResource<R>
The abstract base class for all managed resources in the V2 framework.
AbstractTextSegmentRenderer
Abstract base class for rendering individual text segments (e.g., markdown text or code blocks).
AbstractTool<P extends AbstractToolParameter,C extends AbstractToolCall>
The abstract base class for a tool, now generic on its Parameter and Call types.
AbstractToolCall<T extends AbstractTool<?,?>,R extends AbstractToolResponse<?>>
Represents a request to execute a specific tool.
AbstractToolkit<T extends AbstractTool>
Represents a collection of related tools, parsed from a single Java class.
AbstractToolMessage<T extends AbstractModelMessage>
Represents a message containing the results of tool executions.
AbstractToolParameter<T extends AbstractTool<?,?>>
A rich, self-documenting, abstract representation of a single parameter for a tool method.
AbstractToolResponse<C extends AbstractToolCall<?,?>>
Represents the response of a tool call, designed for deferred execution.
AiExecutors
 
AiProviderRegistry
Manages available AiProvider implementations via programmatic registration.
AiTool
Marks a method as an AI-callable tool and provides essential metadata.
AiToolException
A custom exception that can be thrown by AI tools to provide a concise, user-friendly error message to the model without including a stack trace.
AiToolkit
Marks a class as an AI-callable toolkit and provides essential metadata.
AiToolParam
Provides a description for a parameter of a method marked with AiTool.
AnahataInstaller
Installer for the Anahata ASI V2 module.
AnahataTool
Base class for model generated java.
AnahataToolkit
An optional, abstract base class for toolkits that provides a rich, context-aware API for tool execution, similar to a Servlet or EJB.
AnyChangeDocumentListener
A utility DocumentListener that fires a single callback for any type of document change (insert or remove).
ApiCallInterruptedException
Exception thrown when an AI model generation call is interrupted, either by the user or by the system.
ApiErrorRecord
A record of a single API error, including context for retries.
AsiConfig
A hybrid static/instance class for managing global and application-specific configurations.
AudioPlaybackPanel
A panel that encapsulates all audio playback functionality, including selecting output lines, displaying a progress bar, and playing various audio types.
AudioPlayer
A simple UI utility to play short, non-blocking notification sounds from resources.
AutoPruneIcon
A programmatically drawn icon representing "Auto-Prune".
AutoReplyIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing the auto-reply feature.
BadTool
A special tool implementation representing a tool that was requested by the model but was not found in the registered toolkits.
BadToolCall
Represents a call to a BadTool, capturing an invalid tool request from the model.
BadToolParam
A placeholder parameter for a BadTool.
BadToolResponse
The response for a BadToolCall.
BasicPropertyChangeSource
A base class providing a standard implementation of PropertyChangeSource.
BlobPart
Represents a binary data part, such as an image or a document.
BlobPartPanel
Renders a BlobPart into a JComponent, handling images, audio, and file information.
CandidateSelectionPanel
A specialized panel for displaying multiple response candidates side-by-side.
CardsIcon
A simple icon representing a grid of cards.
Chat
The central, provider-agnostic orchestrator for a single chat session in the V2 architecture.
ChatConfig
A model-agnostic, intelligent configuration object for a single chat session.
ChatPanel
The main, top-level panel for the Anahata AI Swing UI.
ChatStatus
Defines the possible operational states of the Chat, primarily for UI feedback.
ChatTopComponent
The main TopComponent for Anahata ASI V2.
ClasspathPrinter
A helper class to print classpaths in a readable, grouped format.
Cli
The reusable, provider-agnostic core of the Anahata AI Command Line Interface.
CliConfigMenu
The main orchestrator for the Chat Configuration menu in the CLI.
CliMain
The main entry point for the Anahata AI standalone application.
CodeBlockSegmentRenderer
Renders a code block segment into a syntax-highlighted JEditorPane or an RSyntaxTextArea as a fallback.
CodeHyperlink
A specialized JLabel that acts as a clickable hyperlink for displaying code or JSON content in a popup dialog.
CommandLineArgs
A centralized utility for parsing command-line arguments for any Anahata AI launcher.
CompressIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing a context compression action.
ContextManager
The definitive manager for a chat session's context in the V2 architecture.
ContextPosition
Defines the position where a ContextProvider's content should be injected into the request.
ContextProvider
Defines the contract for providers that inject just-in-time context into an AI request.
ContextUsageBar
A custom JPanel that renders a progress bar for context window usage.
ConversationPanel
The main container for the conversation history, responsible for rendering a list of AbstractMessagePanel instances.
CopyIcon
A programmatically drawn icon representing a "Copy" action.
CoreContextProvider
 
DefaultEditorKitProvider
A default implementation of EditorKitProvider that provides the standard kits available in a vanilla Swing environment.
DeleteIcon
A programmatically drawn trash can icon for delete actions.
EditorKitProvider
An interface for providing an EditorKit for a given programming language.
EdtPropertyChangeListener
A smart, lifecycle-aware PropertyChangeListener that ensures UI updates occur on the Event Dispatch Thread (EDT).
EdtPropertyChangeListener.Mode
The execution mode for thread switching.
ExceptionDialog
A custom modal dialog for displaying exceptions with a properly formatted and indented stack trace.
FailureTracker
Tracks repeated failures of specific tool calls to temporarily block them from execution, preventing infinite loops or excessive resource consumption when a model repeatedly calls a broken function.
Files
The definitive V2 toolkit for interacting with file-based resources.
FinishReason
A standardized, model-agnostic enum representing the reason why a model stopped generating content.
GeminiAiProvider
The concrete implementation of the AbstractAiProvider for the Google Gemini API.
GeminiCliChatConfig
A production-ready ChatConfig for the Gemini CLI that registers the GeminiAiProvider.
GeminiContentAdapter
An object-oriented adapter that converts a single Anahata AbstractMessage into a native Google GenAI Content object.
GeminiFunctionDeclarationAdapter
An object-oriented adapter that converts a single Anahata AbstractTool into a native Google GenAI FunctionDeclaration.
GeminiModel
Gemini-specific implementation of the AbstractModel.
GeminiModelMessage
An object-oriented representation of a ModelMessage derived from the Gemini provider.
GeminiPartAdapter
An object-oriented adapter that converts a single Anahata AbstractPart into a native Google GenAI Part.
GeminiResponse
A specialized, object-oriented Response class for the Gemini provider.
GeminiSchemaAdapter
Adapts the core framework's rich JSON schema generation into the simpler, native Google GenAI Schema objects required for function declarations.
GeminiToolMessage
 
GenerationRequest
A simple, immutable record that encapsulates all the information required for a model to generate content: the configuration and the conversation history.
GradientHeaderPanel
A custom JPanel that renders a gradient background and holds a JLabel for the header text.
GroundingMetadata
Metadata about the grounding sources used by the model.
GroundingMetadataPanel
A specialized Swing panel for rendering GroundingMetadata in a rich, interactive format.
GroundingSource
Represents a single web source used for grounding, including its URI and title.
HandyToolStuff
The base class for Java code generated by the AI model.
HeaderPanel
The header panel for the chat UI, containing the chat nickname, session controls, and provider/model selection components.
HtmlRendererUtils
Utility class for rendering Markdown to HTML and creating the corresponding Swing JEditorPane components.
IconUtils
A utility class for loading and scaling icons with high-quality rendering.
InputPanel
A fully functional and responsive user input component for the V2 chat.
InputUserMessage
A specialized UserMessage designed for direct manipulation by UI components like an input panel.
JacksonUtils
A generic utility class for Jackson-based JSON operations.
Java
 
JavaIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing Java.
JavaMethodTool
A model-agnostic, stateful representation of a single Java method tool.
JavaMethodToolCall
A model-agnostic representation of a request to execute a specific Java method tool.
JavaMethodToolParameter
A subclass of AbstractToolParameter that holds Java-specific reflection information, namely the full generic Type of the parameter.
JavaMethodToolResponse
A rich POJO that captures the complete and final outcome of a single tool call.
JavaObjectToolkit
A domain object that parses a Java class via reflection to build a complete, self-contained Toolkit, including all its tools and parameters.
KryoUtils
A utility class for thread-safe Kryo serialization and deserialization.
LineInfo
Represents an available microphone line with its associated mixer information.
LineInfoRenderer
Custom ListCellRenderer for LineInfo to display human-readable names.
LoadSessionIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing the "Load Session" action.
LocalToolsIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing the local tool execution feature (Functions).
MainPanel
The main container for the Anahata AI Swing UI, managing multiple chat sessions.
MarkupTextSegmentRenderer
Renders a markdown text segment into a WrappingEditorPane.
MediaRenderer
A utility class for rendering media content (images, audio) in a consistent way across different UI components.
MicrophoneIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon that shows a microphone with a red base.
MicrophonePanel
A panel that encapsulates all microphone-related UI components and logic.
ModelBlobPart
A specialized BlobPart for binary content generated by the model, including internal thought process details.
ModelMessagePanel
A concrete implementation of AbstractMessagePanel specifically for rendering AbstractModelMessage instances.
ModelTableModel
A table model for displaying AI models and their capabilities.
ModelTextPart
A concrete TextPart implementation for text content generated by the model, including internal thought process details.
ObjectSummarizer
 
OptionalSerializer
A custom Kryo serializer for Optional.
OtherMessagePanel
A specialized scroll pane for rendering any AbstractMessage.
PinnedIcon
A programmatically drawn pushpin icon to represent a "pinned" state.
PlaybackLinePanel
A panel that encapsulates all playback line-related UI components and logic.
Preferences
A unified, serializable POJO that acts as a container for all user-configured preferences.
PropertyChangeSource
A standard interface for objects that provide PropertyChangeSupport.
ProviderRegistryViewer
A panel for viewing and filtering the registered AI models.
PrunedPartsIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing a "pruned" or "hidden" part.
PruningToggleButton
A three-state toggle button for managing the pruning state of an AbstractPart or AbstractMessage.
RagMessage
A specialized UserMessage that represents just-in-time, ephemeral context provided by the environment (Retrieval-Augmented Generation).
RecordingIcon
A simple, programmatically drawn Icon that shows a filled red circle to indicate that a recording is in progress.
RefreshPolicy
Defines the refresh policy for a StatefulResource when its content is provided to the model via the Augmented Workspace.
RequestConfig
The definitive, model-agnostic configuration object for a single API request.
RequestConfigAdapter
A focused adapter responsible for converting our model-agnostic RequestConfig into a Google GenAI GenerateContentConfig.
RequestConfigPanel
A panel for editing the RequestConfig of a Chat session.
ResourceManager
The central, unified manager for all V2 managed resources.
Resources
 
ResourcesMenu
Handles the CLI menu for viewing and managing stateful resources.
Response<T extends AbstractModelMessage>
A standardized, model-agnostic response received from an AI model provider.
ResponseUsageMetadata
Metadata about the token usage for a single API response.
RestartIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing a restart or clear action.
RetryableApiException
A specialized exception indicating that an API call failed but is potentially retryable.
Role
Defines the role of the entity that created a message, providing a type-safe way to distinguish between user, model, and tool messages.
RunAndSendIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing a "Run All and Send" action.
RunIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing a single "Run" action.
SaveSessionIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing the "Save Session" action.
SchemaProvider
A clean, focused provider for generating OpenAPI/Swagger compliant JSON schemas from Java types.
ScrollablePanel
A flexible JPanel that implements the Scrollable interface, allowing for configurable scrolling behavior.
SearchIcon
A programmatically drawn search (magnifying glass) icon using the full Barça palette.
ServerTool
Represents a server-side tool provided by an AI model (e.g., Google Search, Code Execution).
ServerToolsIcon
A programmatically drawn Icon representing server-side tool execution.
Session
A toolkit for managing the current chat session's metadata.
SessionCard
A "sticky note" style card representing an active AI session.
SessionsPanel
A reusable Swing panel for managing active AI chat sessions.
SessionsPanel.SessionController
Interface for controlling session lifecycle from the host application.
SessionsTableModel
A reusable table model for displaying active AI chat sessions.
SessionsTopComponent
A TopComponent that displays a list of all active Anahata ASI sessions.
Shell
A tool provider that allows the AI model to execute commands in the local bash shell.
ShellExecutionResult
 
SliderSpinner
A combined component featuring a JSpinner and a JSlider that stay in sync.
SoundUtils
 
StatusManager
Manages and broadcasts the real-time status of the chat session.
StatusPanel
A panel that displays the real-time status of the chat session, including API call status, context usage, and error/retry information.
StreamObserver<R extends Response<?>>
A simple interface for observing a stream of values, typically used for asynchronous token streaming from an AI model.
SwingChatConfig
A concrete ChatConfig for standalone Swing applications, providing UI-specific settings like themes and colors.
SwingChatConfig.UITheme
 
SwingMain
The main entry point for the Anahata AI standalone Swing application.
SwingTask<T>
 
SwingUtils
A collection of general-purpose Swing utility methods, primarily for image manipulation and UI component creation.
SystemInstructionsMenu
Handles the CLI menu for managing System Instructions Providers.
TableIcon
A simple icon representing a table.
TextFileResource
A concrete resource representing a text file loaded into the context.
TextPart
A concrete AbstractPart implementation for simple text content.
TextPartPanel
Renders a TextPart into a list of JComponents, handling markdown and code block rendering.
TextSegmentDescriptor
A record that describes a segment of text within a TextPartPanel.
TextSegmentType
Defines the type of a text segment within a TextPartRenderer.
TextUtils
A collection of general-purpose text and formatting utility methods.
TextViewport
A powerful engine that manages the view of a text resource.
TextViewportSettings
Encapsulates adjustable viewport configuration.
ThoughtSignature
An interface for model-generated parts that can carry a thought signature.
TikaUtils
 
TimeUtils
Utility class for time-related formatting.
TokenizerUtils
A centralized utility class for token counting, powered by the jtokkit library.
ToolbarPanel
The vertical toolbar panel for the chat UI, containing primary action toggles.
ToolCallPanel
A specialized panel for rendering an AbstractToolCall and its associated AbstractToolResponse within a model message.
ToolDetailPanel
A panel that displays the details and controls for a specific AbstractTool.
ToolExecutionMenu
Handles the interactive CLI menu for managing tool execution requests.
ToolExecutionStatus
Represents the lifecycle status of a single tool's execution.
ToolExecutionStatusRenderer
A specialized renderer for ToolExecutionStatus enums in JComboBoxes.
ToolkitDetailPanel
A panel that displays the details and context previews for a specific AbstractToolkit.
ToolkitsMenu
Handles the CLI menu for managing Toolkits and viewing detailed tool information.
ToolkitTreeTableModel
A TreeTableModel that provides a hierarchical view of Toolkits and their Tools, including a calculated token count for each tool's schema.
ToolManager
Manages the lifecycle of all AI tools, including registration, configuration, and lookup.
ToolPermission
Represents the user's interactive, one-time choice for a specific tool invocation within the UI prompt.
ToolPermissionRenderer
A specialized renderer for ToolPermission enums in JComboBoxes.
ToolResponseAttachment
 
ToolResponseAttachmentsPanel
A panel for rendering a list of ToolResponseAttachments.
ToolsPanel
A panel dedicated to displaying and managing the available AI tools (functions) using a hierarchical JXTreeTable.
TurnsToKeep
A dedicated annotation to explicitly define the retention policy for a tool's call/response pair in the conversation history, in number of user turns.
UICapture
Utility class for capturing screenshots of the host system's display devices and visible application windows.
UserInputMessagePanel
A panel that provides a live, read-only preview of the user's input message, including markdown rendering of the text part and a display of any attached blob parts.
UserMessage
Represents a message originating from the end-user in a conversation.
UserMessagePanel
A concrete implementation of AbstractMessagePanel specifically for rendering UserMessage instances in the conversation history.
WrapLayout
A modified version of FlowLayout that allows components to wrap to the next line.
WrappingEditorPane
A JEditorPane subclass that implements the Scrollable interface to ensure correct line wrapping and horizontal scrolling behavior when placed inside a JScrollPane.
